Summary Note:
The RM met Vázquez González Sánchez during a business conference in Madrid. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Vázquez González Sánchez is a 54 year old and comes from Spain.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Vázquez González Sánchez is currently widowed. He has 2 kids called Martínez and Rodríguez.
Education Background:
Vázquez completed his secondary education at Instituto de Educación Secundaria IES Pedro Salinas Jaén in 1990.
Vázquez earned his degree from Pompeu Fabra University in 1995.
On top of that he then attended ESADE Business & Law School, where he graduated in 1998.
Occupation History:
Vázquez González Sánchez is a 54 year old Hospitality Industry Leader from Spain.
Vázquez González Sánchez's first role was as a Hotel Manager at Iberostar Hotels & Resorts S.A., where he worked diligently from 1994 to 1996 to establish a strong reputation.
His subsequent role was as a General Manager at NH Hotel Group S.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 1998 to 2000.
At NH Hotel Group S.A., he worked as a Regional Vice President from 2002 to 2003, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 2004, he transitioned to Meliá Hotels International S.A. to take on the position of CEO, capitalizing on his expertise to propel business growth.
Since joining Meliá Hotels International S.A. as a Hospitality Industry Leader in 2006, he has established himself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 970000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Bilbao, Palma de Mallorca and Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 2720000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2011.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
